description:
The goal of this event is to gather the Android community in Porto, helping everyone to get up to date and to know Android a little bit better. We'll share knowledge and experience about the Android ecosystem.

This is the #1 Android Session, and it will be hosted in collaboration with XING (https://www.xing.com/) and they'll share with us their experience.

• So, what's the plan here?

18:30 - Welcome snacks!
18:50 - Language abuse & Unreadability - Yahya Bayramoğlu, XING
19:25 - Second talk - to be announced
20:00 - That's all folks!

• Should I bring anything?
There is no need to bring anything, but if you have something cool to show you can bring it and share it with us!

• Important stuff!
If you are joining, please book it here. We have limited sitting.

Also
Join GDG Porto on Slack https://gdgporto.slack.com/ and check out the #dev-android channel! If you need an invite please ping us at organisers@gdgporto.xyz

• About the speakers

Yahya Bayramoğlu is a passionate Android Developer from Turkey and currently working at XING located in Hamburg/Germany. He has been developing for Android Platform since 2012, and he is constantly adapting himself to the platform changes and requirements and always following up the new cool things on industry.

https://github.com/yayaa
https://www.xing.com/profile/Yahya_BAYRAMOGLU
https://twitter.com/YahyaBayramoglu
name: GDG - Android Sessions - #1 XING
